statements: SELECT customer_id, customer_name, address, email, phone_number FROM customer_data;
SELECT * FROM customer_data ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id > 100;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_data WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id > 100 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email, address FROM customer_data WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' AND address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com' ORDER BY customer_name DESC, customer_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_name FROM customer_data WHERE address = '123 Main St';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 'b203ca97-2fec-4ffb-829d-9f11b13c3559';
SELECT customer_id, energy_usage FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY energy_usage DESC;
SELECT customer_id, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE address = '123 Main Street';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, energy_usage FROM customers WHERE energy_usage > 500 ORDER BY energy_usage ASC;
SELECT * FROM preferences WHERE promotion_opt_in = true;
SELECT customer_id, energy_type FROM preferences WHERE energy_type = 'Solar';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT preference_type, preference_value FROM preferences WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT promotion_name, start_date, end_date FROM promotions ORDER BY start_date;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT customer_name, preference_type, preference_value FROM customers JOIN preferences ON customers.customer_id = preferences.customer_id;
SELECT promotion_name, start_date, end_date FROM promotions WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (2, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT id, name, email FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM energy_solutions ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT promotion_name, promotion_type, discount FROM promotions WHERE discount > 0;
SELECT customer_id, preference_type, preference_value FROM preferences ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, email FROM customers WHERE id = 3;
SELECT p.preference_type, p.preference_value, c.name FROM preferences p JOIN customers c ON p.customer_id = c.id WHERE p.preference_type = 'energy';
SELECT ps.solution_name, ps.price, COUNT(*) as total_promotions FROM energy_solutions ps JOIN promotions promo ON ps.id = promo.id GROUP BY ps.solution_name, ps.price;
SELECT * FROM promotions WHERE discount > 0 ORDER BY discount ASC, promotion_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone, customer_address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM preferences WHERE energy_type = 'Solar';
SELECT promotion_name, promotion_type FROM promotions WHERE promotion_type = 'Discount';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 5;
SELECT customers.customer_name, preferences.energy_type, preferences.preferred_promotion FROM customers JOIN preferences ON customers.customer_id = preferences.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM energy_solutions WHERE energy_type = 'Solar' ORDER BY solution_id DESC;
SELECT promotion_name, promotion_description FROM promotions WHERE promotion_type = 'Discount' LIMIT 5;
